title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: April 25, 2023, 05:15:06 AMLast edit: May 06, 2023, 03:20:42 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Ballet has removed the PURE wallets (as unfunded wallets) from the site for the foreseeable future, currently only the solid silver and the gold plated PURE versions are on the site as available unfunded - however, I have been told that I can place bulk orders directly.I have had some ask that I do a group buy to meet the necessary MOQ - so here it is If interested, just post your request as such:.0001 - 5.0002 - 2.0005 - 10.001 - 10.005 - 5.010 - 2.025 - 3Price for the plastic low denomination versions is $6 ea Price for the metal higher denomination versions is $26 eaThe price above includes shipping to me. Once I have them in hand, I can handle them in the following methods:1. I can ship direct - price determined by actual cost of packaging and postage.2. I can hand off to minerjones for consolidation/reshipping. (no cost from me)3. I can hold it for consolidation and reship it at a later date of your choosing. (no cost at this time)I will place the order on May 5th 2023 sometime after 11pm ESTpayment can be sent in any of the following methods:BTC:  bc1qv8a9a6dkcdluw33mzasakxwvkt5m8u8tteh2rsStrike:  strike.me/moparminingllcand if you want a LN invoice just shoot me a DM.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: I bought a mix of these about a year ago. I still haven't worked out what I'm going to do with them, but I thought I'd remind people that you can only load a maximum of the amount on the card and no other crypto.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on April 25, 2023, 08:03:58 AMI bought a mix of these about a year ago. I still haven't worked out what I'm going to do with them, but I thought I'd remind people that you can only load a maximum of the amount on the card and no other crypto.While these are intended to only be loaded to the denominated amount, you can load more if you notate the address separately - however once the load reaches the denominated amount the app will no longer show the address.
